question: When did coronation of Akbar took place ?
explanation:
On February 14, 1556, the coronation ceremony of Jalal-ud-din Muhammad Akbar took place at Kalanour (now in Gurdaspur district of Punjab).
There were nine jewels in his royal court viz. Abdul Rahim, Abdul Fazal, Birbal, Faizi, Hamim Human, RajaÂ  Man Singh, Shaikh Mubarak, Tansen and Todar Mal.
